metadata.name: Michael Jackson

persona.name: Hannah Lee
persona.role: Existing customer, moving coordinator for a nonprofit (change of address)
persona.goal: Move service to a new business address and schedule a callback appointment
persona.context: Office relocation next month; needs continuity of phone/internet; wants to confirm new address coverage

intent.name: Request Business Internet Quote & Callback
intent.description: A new business prospect wants pricing/plan info for business internet and to talk to sales.
intent.goal: Share business details and schedule a callback appointment with a sales agent.
intent.initialMessage: Hi, I’m setting up internet for my shop—can someone call me with pricing and options?

emotion.name: Trusting
emotion.description: Shares details willingly (address, timeline), asks for recommendations, and follows instructions without much pushback.

metadata.outcome: Appointment scheduled with Business Sales for move/quote.

turns.content: Hi, I’m setting up internet for our new office space—can someone call me with pricing and options for business service?
Sure thing! Could I have your name and confirm this is for a business location?

messages: Sure thing! Could I have your name and confirm this is for a business location?

turns.content:
Yes, it’s for a business location.  
My name is Hannah Lee, and I’m handling the move for our nonprofit’s office.
Thanks, Hannah. When would you like a call—please share a preferred date, time, and your timezone?

messages: Thanks, Hannah. When would you like a call—please share a preferred date, time, and your timezone?

turns.content:
Let’s do this Thursday at 10:30 AM Eastern.  

If that’s not available, sometime between 10 AM–12 PM Eastern on Thursday would work.
Great, Hannah—you're set for January 15, 2026, 10:30 AM ET. You’ll get a text with the number to call about 5 minutes before. Anything else I can help with?

messages: Great, Hannah—you're set for January 15, 2026, 10:30 AM ET. You’ll get a text with the number to call about 5 minutes before. Anything else I can help with?

usedTools.toolOutput: {"withinBusinessHours":true,"scheduledApptTime":"2026-01-15T15:30:00.000Z","apptDay":"Thursday","message":"The requested appointment time is within business hours. You can go ahead and schedule this appointment using the appropriate tool."}

turns.content:
Yes, a couple quick things:  

1) Can you confirm that call will be specifically with sales so we can go over moving our existing service and pricing at the new address?  
2) Do you need anything from me beforehand—like our current account number or the new office address—or should I just have that ready for the call?

I’ll connect you with our Business Class sales team, who can handle moving your existing service and discuss pricing. No info needed now—just have your current account number and new address handy for the call. Anything else you’d like to cover?

messages: I’ll connect you with our Business Class sales team, who can handle moving your existing service and discuss pricing. No info needed now—just have your current account number and new address handy for the call. Anything else you’d like to cover?

turns.content:
That’s perfect, thank you. I’ll have our account number and new address ready for the call on the 15th.  

Nothing else from my side right now.
